channel.title: Need help*testscape compile error or something
channel.description:
Right i have changed most of my client.java but i cant compile it this is what it say's when i run the compile.if you dont see picture it sez The filename, directory name or volume label syntax is incorrect.[img]http://C:\DOCUME~1\All Users\Documents\My Pictures[/img]
and this is whats in its notepad file [code]@echo off title gertescape Compiler "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_08in/java.exe" server pause[/code]

item.title: Need help*testscape compile error or something
item.dc:creator: @Yanoooon Yanoooon
item.description:
@Yanoooon wrote:

[quote=“2 short 2die, post:3, topic:13616”]mine sais this
Compiling…
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
Complete!
Press any key to continue . . .

i took
wat cowie said exept i changed the title to natescape copiler…y am i still gettin errors?[/quote]

aah… those noobs these days… go to the java folder, copy the folder’s name that says: “jdk.6.0_11” or some different number, then go to the compiler, right click it, click edit, then, at the jdk, select it, then click paste. do the same with the jre, but copy and paste the folder’s name that says “jre*.*.0_**” (The * are for numbers)

@echo off title Title Compiler "C:Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program Files/Java/jre1.6.0_07/bin/java.exe" server pause

PS: i think ill post a tut… those noobies…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help*testscape compile error or something

item.title: Need help*testscape compile error or something
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

make it look like this

@echo off
Title gertescape Compiler
color 07
echo Compiling…
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe” server
color 03
echo Complete!

pause

Read full topic
